actions.text: Amendment SA 987 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 18. Record Vote Number: 140.

Amendment SA 987 proposed by Senator Moran. (consideration: CR S3900-3901; text: CR S3900) To require the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to carry out research and development regarding a crop insurance program for alfalfa.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 987 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 18. Record Vote Number: 140.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 987 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 18. Record Vote Number: 140.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 987 proposed by Senator Moran.

purpose: To require the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to carry out research and development regarding a crop insurance program for alfalfa.
